PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2014-01692014-02-28AAFC,  FIN,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanadian Agricultural Loans Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Farm Improvement and Marketing Cooperatives Loans and Fees Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the FARM IMPROVEMENT AND MARKETING COOPERATIVES LOANS AND FEES REGULATIONS, 1998 due to the coming into effect of the Canadian Agricultural Loans Act on June 18, 2009, in order to (1) modify and rename the Farm Improvement and Marketing Cooperatives Loans Act; and (2) address comments and recommendations provided by the Standing Joint Committee for the Scrutiny of Regulations.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2014-0039 Publication Date: 2014-03-12
AttachmentsAttachment
